property.name: name
property.formula: (SELECT mast.assetName FROM cmdb_asm_master mast WHERE mast.id = masterId)

property.name: cname
property.formula: (SELECT clus.name FROM cmdb_storagedevice_clusters clus WHERE clus.id = cid)

property.name: serial
property.formula: (SELECT mast.serial FROM cmdb_asm_master mast WHERE mast.id = masterId)

property.name: assMode
property.formula: (SELECT mast.assMode FROM cmdb_asm_master mast WHERE mast.id = masterId)

property.name: ip
property.formula: (SELECT mast.iloIP FROM cmdb_asm_master mast WHERE mast.id = masterId)

property.name: useFlag
property.formula: (SELECT mast.useFlag FROM cmdb_asm_master mast WHERE mast.id = masterId)

property.name: size
property.formula: (SELECT master.disktotal FROM cmdb_asm_master master WHERE master.id = masterId)

property.name: status
property.formula: (SELECT master.status FROM cmdb_asm_master master WHERE master.id = masterId)

property.name: administrator
property.formula: (select t.userName from iyun_sm_user t where t.id = (SELECT master.assetUser FROM cmdb_asm_master master WHERE master.id = masterId))

property.name: type
property.formula: (SELECT clus.type FROM cmdb_storagedevice_clusters clus WHERE clus.id = cid)
